tool_description: The "Affiliate URL Cleaner API" is a web service that removes affiliate parameters and other tracking information from product or service URLs. This API takes a URL as an input and returns a "clean" URL that does not contain any affiliate or tracking parameters.
name: 🔴 AFFILIATE URL CLEANER 🔴 Daddy
title: 🔴 AFFILIATE URL CLEANER 🔴 Daddy

api_list.name: Clean
api_list.description: The main endpoint of the AFFILIATE REMOVE API is a URL cleaning function that removes affiliate parameters and tracking information from a given URL, returning a clean version of the original URL.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://affiliate-url-cleaner-daddy.p.rapidapi.com/aff"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "affiliate-url-cleaner-daddy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
